title: Status Effects
content: two creatures standing close to each other. Shoot the first creature and open the second for a follow-up strike. Hunter's Mark Marked creature takes an additional 1d6 Slashing Damage whenever you hit it with a weapon attacks. Invisibility Target has Advantage on Attack Rolls and impose Disadvantage on enemy Attack Rolls. Attacking or casting a Spells ends this condition. Jump Target has tripled jumping distance.
